title: Ticket #7232: condor_ssh_to_job times out and fails on OSG and locally at CIT
description:
LIGO reports that condor_ssh_to_job always fails to OSG nodes: 

condor_ssh_to_job times out for OSG jobs submitted from ldas-osg.ligo.caltech.edu:

[jclark@ldas-osg] $ condor_ssh_to_job -debug 14788627.0
08/21/19 13:12:33 SharedPortClient: sent connection request to schedd at <131.215.113.204:9618> for shared port id 1739892_c5c0_3
08/21/19 13:12:33 SharedPortClient: sent connection request to local schedd for shared port id 1739892_c5c0_3
08/21/19 13:17:33 condor_read(): timeout reading 21 bytes from local schedd.
08/21/19 13:17:33 IO: Failed to read packet header
08/21/19 13:17:33 Failed to get response from schedd
Failed to get response from schedd
remarks:
James adds that this fails for local CIT jobs too.
